entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 7 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. A few flurries inland this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7 except low minus 13 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7 except low minus 13 inland. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon.
